languages.text: "Никогда... знаешь ли ты, сколько смертных произносили это слово передо мной? И сколько из них спустя минуты готовы были отдать самое дорогое, чтобы прекратить страдания?"

traits.locale_text: "Никогда... знаешь ли ты, сколько смертных произносили это слово передо мной? И сколько из них спустя минуты готовы были отдать самое дорогое, чтобы прекратить страдания?"

languages.text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
languages.original_text: "Никогда... знаешь ли ты, сколько смертных произносили это слово передо мной? И сколько из них спустя минуты готовы были отдать самое дорогое, чтобы прекратить страдания?"

traits.locale_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals spoke this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
"'Never'... do you know how many mortals spoke this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
"'Never... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
"'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
"'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"
"'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

languages.text: «"Nunca"... ¿Sabes cuántos mortales han usado esa palabra al hablar conmigo? ¿Y cuántos de ellos estaban dispuestos a renunciar a todo para detener el tormento unos minutos después?».
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: «"Nunca"... ¿Sabes cuántos mortales han usado esa palabra al hablar conmigo? ¿Y cuántos de ellos estaban dispuestos a renunciar a todo para detener el tormento unos minutos después?».

languages.text: 「『なるものか』か…これまで数えきれないほどの人間が同じことを言ってきた。そのほとんどが、数分後には苦痛から解放されるために、自分が大切にしているものをすべて投げ出そうとした」
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: 「『なるものか』か…これまで数えきれないほどの人間が同じことを言ってきた。そのほとんどが、数分後には苦痛から解放されるために、自分が大切にしているものをすべて投げ出そうとした」

languages.text: “绝不会屈服……你知道有多少凡人曾对我说过这样的话吗？他们之中又有多少人，仅仅坚持几分钟之后就甘愿放弃他们宝贵的一切，只求痛痛快快地一死了之？”
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: “绝不会屈服……你知道有多少凡人曾对我说过这样的话吗？他们之中又有多少人，仅仅坚持几分钟之后就甘愿放弃他们宝贵的一切，只求痛痛快快地一死了之？”

languages.text: « Jamais... savez-vous combien de mortels ont osé prononcer ce mot devant moi ? Et combien parmi eux étaient prêts quelques instants plus tard à tout abandonner pour mettre un terme au tourment qui les accablait ? »
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: « Jamais... savez-vous combien de mortels ont osé prononcer ce mot devant moi ? Et combien parmi eux étaient prêts quelques instants plus tard à tout abandonner pour mettre un terme au tourment qui les accablait ? »

languages.text: "'Niemals' ... Wisst Ihr, von wie vielen Sterblichen ich dieses Wort schon gehört habe? Und wie viele von ihnen nur wenige Minuten später bereit waren, mir alles zu opfern, was ihnen lieb ist, um der Pein ein Ende zu bereiten?"
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: "'Niemals' ... Wisst Ihr, von wie vielen Sterblichen ich dieses Wort schon gehört habe? Und wie viele von ihnen nur wenige Minuten später bereit waren, mir alles zu opfern, was ihnen lieb ist, um der Pein ein Ende zu bereiten?"

languages.text: "'Asla' mı?.. Bu sözü kaç fâniden duyduğumu biliyor musun? Peki ya kaçının dakikalar içinde değer verdikleri her şeyden vazgeçip çektikleri ızdırabın durmasını istediğini?"
languages.original_text: "'Never'... do you know how many mortals uttered this word to me? And how many of them, just minutes later, were willing to give up all that was precious to them to make the torment stop?"

traits.locale_text: “'Asla'... Bu sözü kaç fâniden duyduğumu biliyor musun? Peki ya kaçının dakikalar içinde değer verdikleri her şeyden vazgeçip çektikleri ıstırabın durmasını istediğini?”
